text: Which combination of the following features will suffice to characterize an 0S as a multi-programmed 0s? a. More than one program may be loaded into main memory at the same time for execution b. If a program waits for certain events such as 1/0, another program is immediately scheduled for execution c. If the execution of a program terminates, another program is immediately scheduled for execution. N6 NGO ELCE()] [ACELCIG] DEONOELCTEG) = Lroma Yo
